name: Trinity General School
startIntroPart1: Long ago, we were many schools with one similarity: hatred towards aggressive barbarians of Gehenna Academy. We solved our issues and coordinated our efforts during tea parties, and one day we decided to unite. We uphold the traditions of founding schools, thus every faction is semi-autonomous, but we will stand as one lest we perish alone. Thanks to trading policies, we became the richest great school in Kivotos.
startIntroPart2: I stand before thee, oh three presidents of Tea Party, from factions Pater, Filius and Sanctus. May thy wisdom and worth guide us. May thy faith enlighten our path. May we become the last standing.
attacked: Filthy barbarians think they can overrun us. To arms!
introduction: We, Tea Party, greet thee. Would you like to join us for this cup of tea?
neutralHello: Greetings, may the God bless thee.
neutralLetsHearIt: We see you would like to offer us something. Proceed, please.
neutralNo: After discussing this matter, we have to decline your offer.
neutralYes: After discussing this matter, we agreed to accept your offer.
hateLetsHearIt: What is that you were going to say, scum?
afterPeace: The slaughter is over, we shall be leaving.
tradeRequest: We have prepared a deal to you, would you agree?
uniques: [+1 Happiness] from every [Luxury resource]
[Land] units gain the [Kivotos Halo] promotion

name: Gehenna Academy
startIntroPart1: Gehenna prospers in its freedom and chaos, for the chaos is the key to progress. Our Academy is one of the oldest, but as old as we are, so is our rivalry with Trinity General School. Seriously, how can they be so high and mighty, so obsessed with discipline? They are stagnant losers who will eventually fail.
startIntroPart2: Great Leader Hanuma Makoto, will you try to bring order to this school or direct its chaos to crush its foes? Will you manage to pace along with Millennium or fall like Abydos? Time will show us if your golden statue was worth it...
declaringWar: The war time has come to you!
attacked: Huh? Is that a mistake you made? Well, I will make sure it was the last mistake!
introduction: Hello there. I am Great Leader Makoto of the Gehenna Academy's Pandemonium Society. Ome day I will rule everything!
neutralLetsHearIt: Ho-ho! You would like to make offer?
neutralNo: Ibuki didn't like this offer and I am solidary with her!
neutralYes: How sweet, I will take it!
hateHello: Ugh, it's you... Wish these outlaws killed you on the way here...
hateLetsHearIt: Okay, I, Great Makoto, allow you to spill it out. I am sure it is some nonses though.
hateNo: Nonsense it is, now get outta here!
afterPeace: Okay, now I think we have better problems to solve.
tradeRequest: Hey! Will you accept the deal from the Great Makoto?
uniques: [+3 Happiness, +2 Culture, +1 Production] [in all cities] <when at war>
[Land] units gain the [Kivotos Halo] promotion

name: Arius Branch School
startIntroPart1: Long ago, we were many schools with one similarity: hatred towards aggressive barbarians of Gehenna Academy. We solved our issues and coordinated our efforts during tea parties, and one day they decided to unite. But we refused, we didn't want to be one, grey mass. And they betrayed us, turned their weapons against us. Arius burned, and was erased from history.
startIntroPart2: ...But we live! We will have our vengeance that comes in flaming hatred! And you, Madame Beatrice, shall guide our efforts with your iron fist. Vanitas Vanitatum et Omnia Vanitas!
attacked: You have made a colossal mistake...
introduction: Hello. Madame has considered you undeserving of her presence, so I will watch the diplomacy by her name.
neutralLetsHearIt: Is that what I think it is?..
tradeRequest: Here's the deal. By the day, don't you mind we are terrorists?
uniques: [+75]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
[-100]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when at war>
[Land] units gain the [Kivotos Halo] promotion

name: Abydos High School
startIntroPart1: Abydos is the oldest running school in all Kivotos, our influence can still be noticed in other Great Schools. Legacy of Abydos is truly vast as we keep discovering new and new sites with ancient relics. But after Desertification that started 7 years ago, Abydos District got mostly covered in sand and its economics crumbled, people started to flee, students ceased to enroll and banks demand insane debts to be returned...
startIntroPart2: Will we manage to rise after such fall? Will we regain control and enforce order and stability across this wasteland? TAKANASHI HOSHINO, WAKE UP! I AM BRIEFING YOU!
declaringWar: I tried it to be the easy way. Now we do this a hard way.
defeated: ...Huh. Is that it?.. Guess I have more time to nap then...
introduction: Eh? Hello-hello~! Who might you be, hm?.. I am Takanashi Hoshino, president of Abydos Independent High School...
neutralLetsHearIt: Oh?.. Are you interested in investing in Abydos economics by any chance?..
hateLetsHearIt: What are you going to offer?
tradeRequest: Mmm... Trading, exchanging... How exhausting!.. Here's my deal...
uniques: Free Great Person <upon entering a new era>
[+1 Science, +1 Production, -2 Gold] [in all cities] <upon entering a new era>
Comment [Desertification strikes upon reaching the Atomic era!]
Provides [1] [Desertification] <for every [Cities]> <starting from the [Atomic era]> <hidden from users>
Provides [1] [Desertification] <for every [15] [Owned [Land] Tiles]> <starting from the [Atomic era]> <hidden from users>
[-1]% [Production] [in all cities] <for every [15] [Desertification]> <hidden from users>
[-1]% [Happiness] [in all cities] <for every [15] [Desertification]> <hidden from users>
[-1]% [Food] [in all cities] <for every [15] [Desertification]> <hidden from users>
[-1]% [Gold] [in all cities] <for every [15] [Desertification]> <hidden from users>
[-1]% [Science] [in all cities] <for every [15] [Desertification]> <hidden from users>
[-1]% [Culture] [in all cities] <for every [15] [Desertification]> <hidden from users>
[Land] units gain the [Kivotos Halo] promotion
cities: Abydos High School Main Building Annex

name: Highlander Railroad Academy
startIntroPart1: Highlander Railroad Academy was always... An unorthodox school. Independent but intertwined with corporations, a major force but has no turf at all. Has no army or military club, but always armed to teeth. Highlanders own 80% of railroad networks in Kivotos, we use armored and armed trains to enforce our demands even to such giants as Red Winter and Gehenna. The recent meddle with Abydos was just a minor setback to our plans.
startIntroPart2: Our main objective set by Saint Nephthis Corporation is to-... Nozomi! Hikari! Do you brats even listen?- DON'T PRESS THAT BUTTON!
neutralHello: Yo! Make haste, we are short on schedule!
neutralLetsHearIt: Ho-ho! You have an interesting offer?
hateHello: Speak before we rolled you over with a train!
uniques: [+3 Gold, +3 Production, +3 Culture] from each Trade Route
[+100]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]
[-50]% construction time for [All Road] improvements
[Land] units gain the [Kivotos Halo] promotion

name: Millennium Science School
startIntroPart1: Oh, Millennium. The youngest Great School in Kivotos. Nobody could have even had believed that our humble school would achive such greatness. Our scientific inventions are known and used by majority of population, our potents yield us great money. But we didn't earn our great legacy yet, we are disliked by other Great Schools. They underestimate us. How foolish...
startIntroPart2: President Tsukatsuki Rio, leader of Seminar. You have proven a smart and logical leader with paranoiac tendencies. Will you manage to suppress all opposition? Will Millennium crush these arrogant old schools?
declaringWar: Your illogical behaviour has provoked us to declare war.
introduction: Greetings. I am Tsukatsuki Rio, president of Seminar.
neutralHello: Hello. Don't be impressed by talking coffee machine, its AI needs to he corrected.
neutralNo: This is out of our current plans.
neutralYes: This is suitable for our purposes.
hateNo: This is not according to our plans.
hateYes: This is according to our plans.
afterPeace: War is over, time to process our experience.
tradeRequest: According to calculations, this trade offer will not be rejected.
uniques: Triggers a [Millennium Prize] event <upon turn start> <every [30] turns> <(modified by game speed)>
[+1 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]
[Land] units gain the [Kivotos Halo] promotion

name: Shanhaijing Second Senior School
startIntroPart1: Shanhaijing... A name that resembles ancient, preserved traditions of countless generations before us. Discipline, respect, awe before the Madam... Have these traitors forgotten that? First, we had to allow free entrance to Black Tortoise Promenade streets, these tourists, walking money wallets and nothing more to these merchants under Rumi's lead!
startIntroPart2: What awaits us next, Madam Ryuuge Kisaki? Will we manage to preserve our traditions while keeping up with other Great Schools? What will be left of our school when all of that will be over?..
declaringWar: I, Ryuuge Kisaki of Genryumon, sign my decree: a war against you.
attacked: I, Ryuuge Kisaki of Genryumon, will protect my people from your shadow.
introduction: Greetings, be guest to Shanhaijing Second Senior School. I am Ryuuge Kisaki, president of this school. Fufu, mostly people call me Madam to not mistaken with other presidents.
neutralHello: So you stand before the Madam of Genryumon. What would you like to say?
neutralLetsHearIt: I am listening to your offer.
neutralNo: I am afraid Genryumon and Shanhaijing is not going to accept it.
neutralYes: This is a generous offer. I, Ryuuge Kisaki, accept this offer.
hateHello: I hope Genryumon didn't neat you too hard during interrogation.
hateNo: This is an outrageous offer. Throw this fool away.
afterPeace: Yet another war has passed by Shanhaijing.
tradeRequest: I, Ryuuge Kisaki of Genryumon, offer you this trade.
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Science, +1 Culture, +1 Gold, +1 Faith, +1 Food] [in all cities] <for every [10] [Happiness]>
[Land] units gain the [Kivotos Halo] promotion

name: The Helmet Gang
startIntroPart1: Back in the day, we was just a bunch of hardheads smashin’ skulls and takin’ goods. Then we realized – why fight each other when we could crush EVERYONE else? So we banded together, strapped on our helmets, and now? We’re the baddest, richest, toughest crew in Kivotos. You don’t like it? Haha! Try us.
startIntroPart2: Yo, dumbasses! Listen up! This is Helmet Gang talkin’ da Big Boss, Smash Queen, and Bone Crusher at the top. We don’t do fancy words or weak ‘tea parties.’ We smash, we loot, we stomp. Follow or get flattened.
attacked: THEY THINK THEY CAN HIT US?! CRUSH ‘EM!
introduction: The hell you want? Speak fast or get smashed.
neutralHello: Uh… what? You talkin’ to us?
hateHello: Oh, it’s YOU. Wanna get wrecked?
hateLetsHearIt: You better not be wastin’ ou' time, punk.
hateYes: Tch… FINE. But we’re still gonna kick you later.
afterPeace: BORING. Let’s go find someone to punch.
tradeRequest: Yo, we got stuff. You got stuff. Wanna swap or what?
uniques: Triggers a [Chief Elections] event <upon entering a Golden Age>
[Land] units gain the [Kivotos Halo] promotion
[Land] units gain the [Helmet Gang] promotion
[+50]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities]
"Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game

name: Kaiser Corporation
startIntroPart1: Back in time, Kaiser Corporation used to be an international business organisation mainly targeting poor, undeveloped countries where it enforced its own laws and made people work on factories that produced high quality goods for the wealthy countries. Then, we turned our gazes to Kivotos. Naive, goodie-two-shoes children. What an easy victim to our business trics which we had a lot. Our first idea was to scam the GSC. Disastrous though it was.
startIntroPart2: Well then, enough basking in pleasant past, CEO. Will you manage to increase capital of Kaiser Corporation? Will you be able to crush these fools with halos? Will you rule Kivotos?
declaringWar: You should have paid your debts!
attacked: That goes against article 4 of our contract!
defeated: Run for your lives! Grab what you can!
introduction: Hello, how smart of you to come here to Kaiser Corporation. Here's an interesting contract for you to sign. Haha, trust me, there are no underwater stones!
neutralHello: Good day, partner. What are you going to discuss?
neutralNo: I suppose it was your first trading deal... Not bad. But I still refuse.
hateHello: Dammit, it's you again. Please, faster. My time costs more than yours!
hateLetsHearIt: You better be not wasting my precious time.
hateNo: Tsk, what a bad deal, I am even impressed.
hateYes: I suppose... We can deal with it.
afterPeace: That's a pleasant outcome for this conflict, I assume.
tradeRequest: Hello, would you like to hear out this contract?
uniques: [-1 Food, -1 Culture, +3 Gold] [in all cities] <upon entering a new era>
Comment [This nation is capable of bribing population or committing crimes towards it.]
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your Ally for [10] turns
[+5 Gold, -5 Happiness] [in all cities] <starting from the [Modern era]> <hidden from users>

name: Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy
startIntroPart1: Blossoms fall, street bands sing, birds fly and insects buzz. Ah, what a beautiful land it is, called Hyakkiyako. An ancient land indeed. Land of traditions, ghost stories, festivals and outstandingly pure nature. Who could ever have believed this peaceful corner of Kivotos was a merciless aggressor in days of yore?.. Hah, let's forget such nuances.
startIntroPart2: The darkness still lurks there in mountains, it creeps closer and everyone can feel it though few can understand what exactly is happening. Will you manage to maintain this ignorant, cultured prosperity of Hyakkiyako? Or perhaps everything will fall into darkness once again?
attacked: I have predicted this. You can't tell just how obvious your moves are.
introduction: Greetings, foreigner. I am Amachi Niya, president of Yin-yang Club, and I represent Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy's students. By the way, would you like to listen to haiku Chise has made? They are surely beautiful, and after that I recommend you to go to our festivals!
neutralHello: Hello, friend. Is music pleasant for you?
neutralLetsHearIt: Ah, a trade offer? I can see it will improve our cultural experience.
neutralNo: Aw, how bad I have to decline it.
neutralYes: That's a very good deal, I shall take it.
hateHello: Your end is at hand. Enjoy the music and views while you can.
hateLetsHearIt: Speak your words so that I can forget them.
hateNo: This offer is irrelevant to my plans.
afterPeace: The peace treaties are interesting. How do the fallen react to them? How do they look at those who sign them? I suppose we all will get to understand it one day.
tradeRequest: Hello, an while enjoying a cup of green tea, would you like to hear the deal?
uniques: May buy [Military] units with [Culture] for [2] times their normal Production cost [in all cities]
May buy [{non-[Faith]} {non-[Wonder]}] buildings with [Culture] for [2] times their normal Production cost [in all cities]
[Land] units gain the [Kivotos Halo] promotion

name: Wild Hunt Academy of Arts
attacked: Huh? Is that for rejecting your enrollment application back then?
defeated: Life is temporary, art is immortal...
cities: Wild Hunt Academy of Arts Main Building

name: Odyssey Maritime School
attacked: We will sail away from you.
defeated: The starlight fades above the seas...
